LanguageData.GorSteelHoof.label: steel hoof
LanguageData.GorSteelHoof.description: A hoof made out of steel.
LanguageData.GorStone.label: runestone
LanguageData.GorStoneM.label: large runestone
LanguageData.Leather_Gor.label: gor hide
LanguageData.Leather_Gor.description: The hide of a gor. It's tough and furry. offers good protection and insulation.
LanguageData.KTApparel_Loincloth.label: loincloth
LanguageData.KTApparel_FurMantle.label: furmantle
LanguageData.KTApparel_FurMantle.description: Primitive furmantle. Fur simply stiched together into a mantle.
LanguageData.KTApparel_Chainmail.label: crude chainmail
LanguageData.KTApparel_Chainmail.description: Crude chainmail armour. It protects well but there's a lack of insulation.
LanguageData.KTApparel_Chainhelm.label: crude chain helmet
LanguageData.KTApparel_Chainhelm.description: A crude helmet made with plating and chains. The form of the helmet makes it uncomfortable and practically unusable for most races (Gor restricted).
LanguageData.KTApparel_BullgorPlate.label: bullgor plate
LanguageData.KTApparel_BullgorPlate.description: A huge plate armour made to fit a bullgor (Bullgor restricted).
LanguageData.KTApparel_ShamanRobe.label: shaman robe
LanguageData.KTApparel_ShamanRobe.description: A shaman robe, often worn by bray-shamans. It offers protection aswell as insulation.
LanguageData.KTApparel_ShamanHood.label: shaman hood
LanguageData.KTApparel_ShamanHood.description: A shaman hood, often worn by bray-shamans. It offers protection aswell as insulation
LanguageData.ClovenCygor.label: cygor
LanguageData.ClovenCygor.description: The Cygors are distant cousins of the Minotaurs, but because they hail from the most tainted of all the realms of the Old World, they have diverged greatly from their kin. They are huge, hideously malformed giants, similar in form to Minotaurs, yet each possessed of but a single eye that barely can perceive the mortal world. Cursed with a vision that can only see the winds of magic, Cygors are all quite mad, constantly hunted by ghostly shapes that populate their world.
LanguageData.ClovenCygor.tools.0.label: left fist
LanguageData.ClovenCygor.tools.1.label: right fist
LanguageData.ClovenCygor.tools.2.label: teeth
LanguageData.ClovenCygor.tools.3.label: right horn
LanguageData.ClovenCygor.tools.4.label: left horn
LanguageData.BeastmenHarpy.label: harpy
LanguageData.BeastmenHarpy.description: Harpies are scavengers and opportunists who prey upon the sick, weary, battle-worn and dying. Bestial and savage creatures.

LanguageData.BeastmenHarpy.tools.1.label: right talon

LanguageData.KTMeleeWeapon_MassiveClub.description: A massive club. You would require a big build to be able to wield this weapon (Bullgor restricted).
